languages.text: "Женщина великих дарований, но мало кто утверждал, что благочестие было одним из них. Шептались, что власть развратила ее, заставила поверить, что ей все можно. Известно, что она привечала {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}, нарушала запреты и преступала догмы. Впрочем, как и почти все {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Женщина великих дарований, но мало кто утверждал, что благочестие было одним из них. Шептались, что власть развратила ее, заставила поверить, что ей все можно. Известно, что она привечала ксеносов, нарушала запреты и преступала догмы. Впрочем, как и почти все Вольные Торговцы".

languages.text: "A woman of great gifts, but few considered virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Женщина великих дарований, но мало кто утверждал, что благочестие было одним из них. Шептались, что власть развратила ее, заставила поверить, что ей все можно. Известно, что она привечала {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}, нарушала запреты и преступала догмы. Впрочем, как и почти все {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "A woman of great gifts, but few thought virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to xenos, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all Rogue Traders."

"A woman of great gifts, but few considered virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}."

languages.text: “她拥有着出类拔萃的天赋，但很少有人认为她的美德也同样不同凡响。人们低声说，权力腐蚀了她，让她以为她有权得到她想要的一切。众所周知，她对{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}表露出亲切的态度。她打破禁忌，违反教条。不过话说回来，几乎所有的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}都是如此。”
languages.original_text: "A woman of great gifts, but few considered virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “她拥有着出类拔萃的天赋，但很少有人认为她的美德也同样不同凡响。人们低声说，权力腐蚀了她，让她以为她有权得到她想要的一切。众所周知，她对{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}表露出亲切的态度。她打破禁忌，违反教条。不过话说回来，几乎所有的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}都是如此。”

languages.text: «Una mujer de grandes dotes, aunque muy pocos consideran que la virtud sea una de ellas. Corría el rumor de que el poder la había corrompido, que erróneamente pensó que tenía derecho a obtener lo que quisiera. Es bien sabido que se mostró cordial con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, rompió tabús y quebrantó dogmas. Aunque, por otro lado, eso es algo común entre los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}».
languages.original_text: "A woman of great gifts, but few considered virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Una mujer de grandes dotes, aunque muy pocos consideran que la virtud sea una de ellas. Corría el rumor de que el poder la había corrompido, que erróneamente pensó que tenía derecho a obtener lo que quisiera. Es bien sabido que se mostró cordial con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, rompió tabús y quebrantó dogmas. Aunque, por otro lado, eso es algo común entre los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}».

languages.text: 「彼女は偉大な才能に恵まれていましたが、美徳をそのひとつだと考える者はほとんどいませんでした。権力が彼女を堕落させ、求めるものすべてを手に入れる権利があると信じ込ませたと、人々は噂しておりました。彼女は{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と親しくし、禁忌を破り、教義に反していました。とはいえ、ほとんどすべての{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}も同じようなものですがね」
languages.original_text: "A woman of great gifts, but few considered virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は偉大な才能に恵まれていましたが、美徳をそのひとつだと考える者はほとんどいませんでした。権力が彼女を堕落させ、求めるものすべてを手に入れる権利があると信じ込ませたと、人々は噂しておりました。彼女は{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と親しくし、禁忌を破り、教義に反していました。とはいえ、ほとんどすべての{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}も同じようなものですがね」

languages.text: "Eine Frau mit vielen Talenten, aber nur wenige würden Tugendhaftigkeit dazuzählen. Man munkelte, die Macht hätte sie korrumpiert und glauben lassen, ihr stünde alles zu, was sie wollte. Es ist bekannt, dass sie {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} gut behandelt, Tabus gebrochen und Dogmen verletzt hat. Andererseits gilt das für fast alle {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}."
languages.original_text: "A woman of great gifts, but few considered virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Frau mit vielen Talenten, aber nur wenige würden Tugendhaftigkeit dazuzählen. Man munkelte, die Macht hätte sie korrumpiert und glauben lassen, ihr stünde alles zu, was sie wollte. Es ist bekannt, dass sie {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} gut behandelt, Tabus gebrochen und Dogmen verletzt hat. Andererseits gilt das für fast alle {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}."

languages.text: « Elle était une femme aux multiples talents, mais la vertu n'en faisait certainement pas partie. Les gens murmuraient que le pouvoir l'avait corrompue, la poussant à croire que tout lui était dû. Il est de notoriété publique qu'elle s'acoquinait avec des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, qu'elle brisait des tabous et enfreignait des dogmes. Mais après tout, n'est-ce pas là le lot de presque tous les {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: "A woman of great gifts, but few considered virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Elle était une femme aux multiples talents, mais la vertu n'en faisait certainement pas partie. Les gens murmuraient que le pouvoir l'avait corrompue, la poussant à croire que tout lui était dû. Il est de notoriété publique qu'elle s'acoquinait avec des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, qu'elle brisait des tabous et enfreignait des dogmes. Mais après tout, n'est-ce pas là le lot de presque tous les {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g} ? »

languages.text: "Büyük meziyetleri olan bir kadındı lakin birçoklarına göre erdem, bunlar arasında değildi. İnsanlar gücün onu yozlaştırdığını, istediği her şeye el koyma hakkı olduğuna inandırdığını fısıldardı. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolara{/g} sempati beslediği, tabuları yıktığı ve dogmaları ihlal ettiği bilinen bir gerçek. Hoş, bu söylediklerim neredeyse tüm {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirler{/g} için geçerli."
languages.original_text: "A woman of great gifts, but few considered virtue to be one of them. People whispered that power had corrupted her, made her believe that she was entitled to anything she wanted. It is known that she showed cordiality to {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, broke taboos, and violated dogmas. Then again, so do nearly all {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Birçok meziyeti olan bir kadın ama erdemin bu meziyetlerden biri olduğunu fazla kişi söyleyemez. İnsanlar kendi aralarında gücün onu yozlaştırdığını, istediği her şeyi yapmaya hakkı olduğuna inandırdığını fısıldıyorlardı. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g}lara sempati beslediği, tabuları yıktığı ve dogmaları ihlal ettiği bilinen bir gerçek. Hoş, bu söylediklerim neredeyse tüm {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}ler için geçerli."
